title: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Taxable Income
description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Taxable Income

summary.description: Details the high-level taxable income for the calculation.

totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources.title: totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources
totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources.description: The total income received from all income sources. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalTaxableIncome.title: totalTaxableIncome
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total income that is taxable across all income sources after allowances and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

detail.description: Details the low-level taxable income for the calculation.

payPensionsProfit.description: Details the low-level pay, pensions and profit taxable income.

incomeReceived.title: incomeReceived
incomeReceived.description: The income received across all pay, pensions and profit sources. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income across all pay, pensions and profit sources after allowances and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalSelfEmploymentProfit.title: totalSelfEmploymentProfit
totalSelfEmploymentProfit.description: The total self-employment profit for all self-employment businesses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalPropertyProfit.title: totalPropertyProfit
totalPropertyProfit.description: The total property profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalFHLPropertyProfit.title: totalFHLPropertyProfit
totalFHLPropertyProfit.description: The total FHL profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUKOtherPropertyProfit.title: totalUKOtherPropertyProfit
totalUKOtherPropertyProfit.description: The total UK Property Non-FHL profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

businessProfitAndLoss.description: Details the low-level profit and loss position for business income sources.

selfEmployments.description: A list that shows the low-level profit and loss position for each self-employment business

selfEmploymentId.title: selfEmploymentId
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses the result will be displayed in this field. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result will be displayed in this field. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

class4loss.title: class4loss
class4loss.description: The class 4 loss for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions for the self-employment business. The additions relate to the additions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions for the self-employment business. The deductions relate to the deductions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: The accounting adjustments for the self-employment business. The accounting adjustments relate to the accounting adjustments mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss for the self-employment business after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit for the self-employment business after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Details high-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for the self-employment business. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total brought forward Income Tax losses for the self-employment business. It is the sum of the current loss value for each Income Tax loss in the losses brought forward array. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The brought forward Income Tax losses from previous tax years that have been used against the self-employment business profit for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total Income Tax losses carried forward where a carry-forward claim has been made for the tax year of the calculation and/or the total losses brought forward from previous years that cannot be fully used against profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.title: totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses
totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.description: The total brought forward Class 4 National Insurance contribution losses for the self-employment business. It is the sum of the current loss value for each Class 4 loss in the losses brought forward array. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.title: broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed
broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.description: The brought forward Class 4 National Insurance contribution losses from previous tax years that have been used against the Class 4 National Insurance contributions for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed
carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.description: The Class 4 National Insurance losses carried sideways that have been used in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.title: totalClass4LossesCarriedForward
totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.description: The total Class 4 losses carried forward where a carry-forward claim has been made for the tax year of the calculation and/or the total Class 4 losses brought forward from previous years that cannot be fully used against the National Insurance contributions for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description: Details low-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for the self-employment business. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

lossesBroughtForward.description: A list of losses brought forward into this calculation for the self-employment business.

lossType.title: lossType
lossType.description: The type of loss brought forward.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

resultOfClaimsApplied.description: A list of loss claims factored into this calculation for the self-employment business.

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The ID of the loss claim.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the loss claim was first made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of loss claim that was made.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates whether the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

lossAmountUsed.title: lossAmountUsed
lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of loss used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.title: remainingLossValue
remainingLossValue.description: The amount of loss remaining that could be not be used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

unclaimedLosses.description: An array of losses that have arisen out of this calculation for the self-employment business and available to claim in the next calculation where a 'default' carry forward claim could not be applied.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was initially incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

expires.title: expires
expires.description: The tax year in which the loss expires. Format: YYYY-YY

carriedForwardLosses.description: Losses arising in this calculation for the self-employment business carried forward to the next calculation where a claim has been made.

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The unique ID of the claim made by the taxpayer.

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was made. Format: YYYY-YY

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was initially incurred Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossType.title: lossType
lossType.description: The type of loss brought forward.

claimsNotApplied.description: A list of loss claims that could not be applied in this calculation for the self-employment business

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The ID of the claim made by the taxpayer.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was initially made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

ukPropertyFhl.description: Details the low-level profit and loss position for UK Property FHL.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income for UK Property FHL. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for UK Property FHL. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses then the result will be displayed in this field. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses than the result will be displayed in this field. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions for UK Property FHL. The additions relate to the additions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions for UK Property FHL. The deductions relate to the deductions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: The accounting adjustments for UK Property FHL. The accounting adjustments relate to the accounting adjustments mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss for UK Property FHL after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit for UK Property FHL after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Details high-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for UK Property FHL. This will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

lossForCSFHL.title: lossForCSFHL
lossForCSFHL.description: The losses from UK Property Non-FHL that have been carried sideways to UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total brought forward Income Tax losses for UK Property FHL. It is the sum of the current loss value for each Income Tax loss in the losses brought forward array. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The brought forward Income Tax losses from previous tax years that have been used against the UK Property FHL profit for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total Income Tax losses carried forward where a carry-forward claim has been made for the tax year of the calculation and/or the total losses brought forward from previous years that cannot be fully used against profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description: Details low-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for UK Property FHL. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

lossesBroughtForward.description: A list of losses brought forward into this calculation for UK Property FHL.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

resultOfClaimsApplied.description: A list of loss claims factored into this calculation for UK Property FHL.

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The ID of the loss claim.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the loss claim was first made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

lossAmountUsed.title: lossAmountUsed
lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of the loss that could be used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.title: remainingLossValue
remainingLossValue.description: The amount of loss remaining that could be not be used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

defaultCarriedForwardLosses.description: A list of losses arising in this calculation that have been carried forward to the next calculation by default for UK Property FHL.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

ukPropertyNonFhl.description: Details the low-level profit and loss position for UK Property Non-FHL

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income for UK Property Non-FHL. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for UK property Non-FHL. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses then the result will be displayed in this field. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result will be displayed in this field. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions for UK Property Non-FHL. The additions relate to the additions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions for UK Property Non-FHL. The deductions relate to the deductions mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: The accounting adjustments for UK Property Non-FHL. The accounting adjustments relate to the accounting adjustments mentioned in the Business Income Source Summary. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss for the UK Property Non-FHL after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit for UK Property Non-FHL after all additions and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after any carry sideways or brought forward losses have been deducted. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Details high-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for UK Property Non-FHL. This will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total brought forward Income Tax losses for UK Property Non-FHL. It is the sum of the current loss value for each Income Tax loss in the losses brought forward array. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The brought forward Income Tax losses from previous tax years that have been used against the UK Property Non-FHL profit for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total Income Tax losses carried forward where a carry-forward claim has been made for the tax year of the calculation and/or the total losses brought forward from previous years that cannot be fully used against profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description: Details low-level loss brought forward amounts and claims that were or were not applied in the calculation for UK Property Non-FHL. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

lossesBroughtForward.description: A list of losses brought forward into this calculation for the UK Property Non-FHL business.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

resultOfClaimsApplied.description: A list of loss claims factored into this calculation for UK Property Non-FHL

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The ID of the loss claim.

originatingClaimId.title: originatingClaimId
originatingClaimId.description: The ID of an original carry-sideways-fhl/carry-sideways claim where not all of the loss in the calculation year could be carried sideways and the resulting loss balance was carried forwards. Where a resulting carry sideways loss balance is carried forwards there will not be a new claim ID for the carried forward portion of the loss.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the loss claim was first made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Indicates the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

lossAmountUsed.title: lossAmountUsed
lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of the loss that could be used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.title: remainingLossValue
remainingLossValue.description: The amount of loss remaining that could be not be used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

defaultCarriedForwardLosses.description: A list of losses arising in this calculation that have been carried forward to the next calculation by default for UK Property Non-FHL.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was first incurred. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

claimsNotApplied.description: A list of loss claims that could not be applied in this calculation for UK Property Non-FHL.

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The ID of the claim made by the taxpayer.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was initially made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

savingsAndGains.description: Details the low-level savings and gains taxable income

incomeReceived.title: incomeReceived
incomeReceived.description: The savings and gains income received. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The savings and gains taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

savings.description: A list of the savings income for each savings account.

savingsAccountId.title: savingsAccountId
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account.

savingsAccountName.title: savingsAccountName
savingsAccountName.description: Friendly account name. Each account name will be unique for that National Insurance number. The account name will be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@.

grossIncome.title: grossIncome
grossIncome.description: The gross interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.title: netIncome
netIncome.description: The net interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.title: taxDeducted
taxDeducted.description: The tax deducted from the savings account (gross minus net). The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeReceived.title: incomeReceived
incomeReceived.description: The dividends income received. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The dividends taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
